parameters.name: weaviate_version
parameters.description: Select the Weaviate version to use.

options.name: v1.32.7
options.description: Latest stable release with all features

options.name: v1.30.0
options.description: Runtime config management, Dynamic user management, Dynamic RAG model selection

parameters.name: weaviate_volume
parameters.description: How should Weaviate's data be persisted?

options.name: named-volume
options.description: Docker will create a named volume called weaviate_data.

options.name: host-binding
options.description: Docker will mount ./weaviate_data on the host to the container.

options.name: no-volume
options.description: Not recommended: Data may be lost on container restart.

options.name: text2vec-transformers
options.description: Local, high-accuracy model. Requires GPUs to run efficiently.

options.name: text2vec-ollama
options.description: Uses a local Ollama container for embeddings.

options.name: img2vec-neural-pytorch
options.description: Pytorch-based ResNet50 model. Runs on CPU or CUDA-GPU.

options.name: img2vec-neural-keras
options.description: Keras-based ResNet50 model. Restricted to amd64 and CPU.

options.name: generative-ollama
options.description: Uses a local Ollama container for generative AI.

parameters.name: additional_modules
parameters.description: Enable additional modules for backups, spell checking, etc.

options.name: backup-s3
options.description: Back up and restore Weaviate to an S3 bucket.

options.name: reranker-transformers
options.description: Rerank search results using a local transformers model.

parameters.name: transformers_model
parameters.description: Select the specific model for the text2vec-transformers module.
